Workflow Setup Guide

Process

1. Add the Anaconda Project Worker Command:

Worker: 
    env_spec: worker
    unix: mlflow-adsp worker

2. Ensure the worker environment contains at least:

 worker:
   description: Worker Environment
   packages:
     # Language Level
     - python>=3.8

     # MLFlow
     - mlflow>=2.3.0
     - make
     - virtualenv
     - pip
     - click

     # AE5
     - ipykernel
     - ae5-tools>=0.6.1

     # AE5 [MLFlow]
     - mlflow-adsp
